reviews.review_msg: Burnham doesn't give the explanation necessary for a 1st year course - as a 3rd year student I was explaining assignment requirements to my classmates who felt lost. The classroom environment was not receptive to questions and he shut them down. He seemed particularly dismissive of female students.

The lectures are extremely boring, wouldn't recommend on taking his class, doesn't really care about his students. Does pick put good TA thou, but marking is very strict. If i were you, i wouldn't take his class again.
